About.intro_section_subtitle: Welcome To Spaces For Peace and Development
About.intro_section_content: Spaces for peace and development organization is a non- governmental non – profit nonpolitical national organization founded and registered with the Humanitarian Aid Commission (HAC) in Sudan 2020; and aims on promoting the interest of the local communities to achieve universal and equal access to safe, affordable drinking water (IWRM), quality education, ٌSustainable and resilient cities, clean energy and management of local consumption and production.
About.mission: We exist to be the first responders to every crisis, providing humanitarian interventions in the best way possible and to sharpen the skills of our community in handling difficult situations through professional training and capacity building.
About.strategy: Spaces organization strategy to create and enabling environment, enhance local capabilities and strengthen and empower communities and civil society.
About.humanity_content: Spaces bring assistance to right holder without discrimination to the targeted groups and work to alleviate human suffering wherever it may be found.
About.transparenacy_content: Transparency is a highly valued principle by almost every staff. We value transparent relationships with stakeholders.
About.accountability_content: Spaces staff hold themselves accountable to both those we seek to assist and those from whom we accept resources and also accountable to donors, beneficiaries and relevant authorities.
About.neutrality_content: In order to continue to enjoy the confidence of all ,the Spaces may not take sides in hostilities because we are working in the field of conflict mitigation and peace building sector or engage of any time in controversies of political, racial, religious or ideological nature.
About.independence_content: The Spaces is independent formulate and implement their own policies independently of government policies or actions, also there are auxiliaries in the humanitarian services and subject to the laws of our country.
About.obj_2: To sensitize the communities on good sanitation and affordability of clean water.
About.obj_3: Understanding the rural communities about the utilization of resilient housing.
About.obj_4: Pushing the local communities to take action on implementing the green energy
About.obj_5: Provision of the necessary skills to local communities on how they can consume and produce locally.
About.obj_7: Ensure access of quality education to the less privilege families.
About.obj_8: Create networks with local, regional and international partners.
About.team_title: Meet The Amazing People Behind Our Success

About.vision: Enabling the communities to make a positive change and to be the compass for positive change for those working in the humanitarian field.
About.impartiality_content: Spaces makes no discrimination as nationality, race, and religious beliefs, class or political opinions, it endeavors to relieve the suffering of individuals being guided solely by their needs and to give priority to the most urgent cases of distress.
